input.sentences: tammy opened her new bookshop last friday .
we went to look around at the various books she sold .
our favorite were the self help books .
the selection was wide and included fanstasy as well .
[male] prefered the adventure books over the rest .
output.sentences: Tammy heard that on Friday, a new bookshop would be opening in her area.
She loved being anywhere that sold books.
As soon as she went through the door she saw one of her favorite books.
There was a wide selection of books that included the best seller A Hard Road To Glory.
When she sat at a table to rest, she looked up and saw a few books she could by for that preferred male in her life.
